metadata.name: Love Affair
metadata.description:
Prof. Romil Kalinov is a Bulgarian artist who was born in Sofia 1958 and graduated from Sofia High School of Art and the National Academy of Arts Nikolai Pavlovic (graphic), 1987. He is a lecturer in the graphics on textiles and ceramics in the National Academy of Art.
Prof. Romil Kalinov presents numerous solo and joint exhibitions all over the world (USA, JAPAN, Italy, Spain, etc.) The art of Prof. Romil Kalinov is recognizable all over the world.

Each NFT is unique in the world (from the digitized paintings) 

The paintings and NFTs of Prof. Romil Kalinov are highly valued and limited in quantity.
